snippet: Swollen rivers in Bulgaria and Greece burst their banks on Tuesday, leaving dozens of homes underwater, as Bulgarian officials declared a day of mourning for eight people confirmed killed after a dam collapsed.
abstract: Swollen rivers in Bulgaria and Greece burst their banks, leaving dozens of homes under water, as Bulgarian officials declare a day of mourning for eight people confirmed killed after a dam collapsed.
lead_paragraph: Swollen rivers in Bulgaria and Greece burst their banks on Tuesday, leaving dozens of homes underwater, as Bulgarian officials declared a day of mourning for eight people confirmed killed after a dam collapsed.
